website_summaries.verdict: The $20 Jazwares Star Wars Multi-Device R2-D2 Stereo Headphones aren't going to bowl you over with high-quality audio output—and you can forget about bass. But they're not bad for a cheap pair of toy headphones.

customer_reviews.title: Kid loved them, Mom has some reservations
customer_reviews.text: Liked the headphones okay, but I should have read the description better. I was expecting these to be for kids and have the sound damper on them to prevent kids from turning sound up too high. Also I'm not too fond of the cord being detachable, makes it very easy for kids to pull off and loose.
customer_reviews.author: MommaEgger

customer_reviews.title: she loved them! They arrived quickly and were great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a gift, she loved them! They arrived quickly and were great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is good but the aux cord is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good but the aux cord is flimsy... already isn't working. Works if I have it pulling form the source which is just ridiculous. Gave two stars because the sound i good when it works. I also like the option to raise or lower the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: and not easy to travel
customer_reviews.text: fashionable, but low quality sound,.. and not easy to travel with
customer_reviews.author: lauren miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! We definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: my son loves these headphones!! Great quality! We definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a young Star Wars fan
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these headphones is solid, if not spectacular and comfortable for my 5 year old to wear. He loves them and wants to wear them all the time
customer_reviews.author: jterrell

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year old son uses these all the time. They have survived him and still work great.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherM

customer_reviews.title: as described
customer_reviews.text: We got exact what we ordered! It shipped quickly! It's good quality. We got it for our son for Christmas and it's still in good shape! Would order here again!
customer_reviews.author: April Wages

customer_reviews.title: in love
customer_reviews.text: I love them! good speakers! The is long which is a plus because most are short. I love that its simple but awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Perez

customer_reviews.title: ... had 2 of these for my boys and they LOVED them. They adjusted well
customer_reviews.text: We had 2 of these for my boys and they LOVED them. They adjusted well, had a volume control we were VERY pleased. However after only 4 months BOTH pair broke. We are disappointed and Jazwares customer service told me they quit distributing these 3 years ago so they can't help me.
customer_reviews.author: JMeyer

customer_reviews.title: I can't handle my disappointment. they were very uncomfortable and the cushioning was ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going ot return these. I can't handle my disappointment. they were very uncomfortable and the cushioning was subpar :( it also needed to be held into the audio port on my computer in order to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Fires Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: I really love these I would just like for you guys to ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love these I would just like for you guys to get more in stock please, and thank you. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mindie Cromer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My son just got these for a gift and only one headphone works!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Cowsky

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, and it shows...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very decent for the price. However, after a week of owning these headphones, the right speaker stopped working. Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gebhardt

product_meta.title: Star Wars 15291 R2D2 Headphones
product_meta.description: Bop your head to your favorite tunes with these must have R2D2 headphones.
feature_bullets: Volume control Multi Device Stereo Headphones.
Over ear headphones with soft cushioned ear cups
